entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 11:00 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -9.5°C
Wind: NW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 early in the evening then becoming light after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
